Bullying is not tolerated by Paducah ISD.Â

span.strong: Any parent or student who believes that a student has experienced bullying or has engaged in bullying is encouraged to report the incident immediately to the campus Principal.

strong.a: Click for the anonymous bullying form.

div.p: Please refer any problems or suggestions to Shannon Waitman, Paducah ISD Webmaster
